question: State eight order of work preparation for service.
answer: (a) Eight order of work in preparation for service; (i) Greet guests with smile (ii) Serve beverages from the right side with the right hand or in any convenient manner (iii) Remember to serve the ladies first (iv) Clear the table remove from the right with right hand or in a convenient manner (v) Serve food from the left side with the left hand (vi) Clear dishes after all guestshave finished (vii) Serve beverages within 3-4 minutes from time ordered (viii) Present food check to guest, check and make necesssary changes in food order (ix) payment should be made by guest (x) Say thank you sir or madam with smile on the face.

question:
(a) List four accompaniments that go with fish.

(b) State four points to note in making cocktail.
answer:
(a) Four accompaniments that go with fish; (i) Lemon, hollandaise sauce (ii) Mayonnaise on another mayonnaise based sauce (iii Banku (iv) Cayenne pepper (v) Pepper mill, chopped onions and capers, tartar sauce.

(b) Four points to note in making cocktails; (i) Use fresh ingredients (ii) Match the drink and glass temperature (iii) Use garnishs when ppropraite (iv) Measure all the cocktail ingredients (v) Get quality liquor.

question:
(a) State four basic information required when recording accident at work.

(b) State four steps to be taken when handling complaints.
answer:
(a) Four basic information required when recording accidents at work; (i) The date when the report is made (ii) The method of reporting (iii) The date, time and place of event (iv) Personal details of those involved (v) A brief description of the nature of the event or disease 

(b) Four steps to be taken when handling complaints; (i) Listen and understand, first always listen to the customer (ii) Empathize with their position to create a bond between you and the customer (iii) Offer a solution to their problem (iv) Execute the solution, try to solve their problem (v) Follow-up

question:
(a) List eight equipments in the bar.

(b) State four important points in maintenance and care of kitchen equipments.
answer:
(a) Eight equipments in the bar; (i) Jug (ii) Pot (iii) Glasses (iv) Bottle opener (v) Can opener (vi) Electric blender (v) Cocktail shakers (viii)  Waiters friend (corkscrew used to open bottles of wine) (ix) Aprons (x) Fruit knife (xi) Ice scoop (xii) Bar spoon (xiii) Free power (xiv) Glass cleaning brush (xv) Lemon squeeze (xvi) Fruit juicer 

(b) Important point in maintenance and care of kitchen equipment; (i) Periodic check of the equipment (ii) Careful usage of the equipment (iii) Following manufacturer's instructions (iv) Reporting faults to the appropraite authority (v) Keeping a log book (vi) Regular cleaning (dusting, wiping and washing) (vii) Appropraite storage

question:
(a) State five points to consider when selecting methods of cooking.

(b) State three reasons for cooking foods.
answer:
(a) Five points to consider when selecting methods of cooking; (i) The type of food being cooked (ii) Consider what you have at your disposal (iii) Time available (iv) Age and health of persons to eat the foods (v) Loss of nutrients (vi) Knowledge of the cook in using a method of cooking 

(b) Reasons for cooking food; (i) To change or improve the taste of the food e.g flour being used to make cake (ii) To change or enhance the appearance of the food (iii) To change the texture of food (iv) To make food safer to consume (v) To make foods more digestable (vi) To increase the shelf life of the food
